name: Tesla Tower
description: A cross of Lazy Bee Garden’s favorite sativa hybrids, Tesla Tower is a robust strain with cerebral effects. This in-house cross offers the creative attributes of White Fire OG with the uplifting, energetic high of Snowcap, creating an upbeat buzz that is both stimulating and motivating. This strain is a helpful companion while getting chores done or going on an adventure. Tesla Tower was also runner up Best Sativa at the 2017 Dope Cup.
attributes_title: Tingly, Uplifted, Relaxed, Creative, Energetic, Depression, Pain, Stress, Eye Pressure, Fatigue
